column2: The followers of the Orange King worship the alleged consort of the Queen: Hadit. They believe that he rules earth directly on behalf of his most beautiful heavenly Queen. Tracing their origins back to the ancient group simply known as the Orange Order, the adherents of the Thelemic Lodge of the Orange King to this day maintain their loyalty to the Queen and Britannia with a devotion that is seldom matched by even the most zealous of Thelemic practitioners.
